reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: INGO Aid to the Transparency international (TI)

description.narrative: Core support to Transparency International (TI) activities which are dedicated to increase government accountability and curb both international and national corruption. TI is acting in over 90 countries and it is the leading global NGO working against cor ruption and has succeeded in placing and maintaining corruption on the international agenda while also developing the tools to address it. The organization has expanded its? activities especially in the developing countries where corruption delays the eco nomic growth but also restrains the realization of the rights of the citizens. The mission of TI is to stop corruption and promote transparency accountability and integrity at all levels and across all sectors of society globally.
